seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 5+ years experience, which perfectly matches senior level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on ETL processes, data pipelines, data models, and data infrastructure - all core data engineering functions

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions 'Data Lake Engineering Team', big data tools (Hadoop, Spark, Kafka), and both batch processing (Airflow) and streaming capabilities, indicating hybrid data lake approach

leadership_expectation.evidence: Senior level role with mentions of collaborating with cross-functional teams and driving data projects, suggesting technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'AWS cloud services' multiple times and lists AWS-specific data pipeline tools

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only AWS cloud services mentioned, no other cloud providers referenced in the job description

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both batch processing (Airflow for ETL processes, scheduled pipelines) and streaming capabilities (Kafka for real-time data), indicating hybrid approach

orchestrator_category.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Apache Airflow' as the data pipeline orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Team is specifically called 'Data Lake Engineering Team' and mentions big data tools (Hadoop, Spark) typically used in data lake architectures

remote_restriction.evidence: Position is onsite in Denver, CO with no remote work options mentioned, requiring candidates to be in the Denver metropolitan area

timezone_focus.evidence: US-only restriction with Denver, CO location suggests Americas timezone focus, though no specific timezone requirements stated

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in Denver suggests candidates should already be in the area, but no relocation assistance mentioned

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit visa sponsorship mention, but as a major corporation (Walmart/VIZIO) with full-time permanent positions, likely to offer sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No specific mention of student visa support, and 5+ years experience requirement suggests preference for experienced candidates

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirements mentioned, standard work authorization implied for US-based position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employee position with comprehensive benefits package (medical, 401k, stock purchase) indicates W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including medical/vision/dental coverage, 401k, stock purchase, PTO, parental leave, education programs, and disability coverage - 15+ benefit types

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'drive impactful data projects' and 'contribute to the future of data engineering' but no specific career progression paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'collaborate with cross-functional teams' and working in a 'dynamic' team environment, suggesting interaction with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No specific promotion or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility programs within the organization

career_tracks_available.evidence: Senior data engineer role suggests IC track progression potential, but no specific tracks mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required qualifications (5+ years, specific technologies) and preferred qualifications, with balanced approach

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description with well-defined data engineering responsibilities, single clear role without scope creep

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills and requirements (Python, SQL, AWS, 5+ years) are appropriate and realistic for senior data engineer level
